summary: Email chain between Assistant U.S. Attorney Maurene Comey and defense attorney Christian Everdell regarding a letter from Ghislaine Maxwell's counsel, scheduling a call to discuss the matter. The document shows communication between prosecution and defense teams in the Maxwell case.

persons.name: Maurene Comey
persons.context: Prosecutor in the Southern District of New York handling the Ghislaine Maxwell case, coordinating a call to discuss a letter from Maxwell's defense counsel.

persons.name: Christian Everdell
persons.context: Attorney from Cohen & Gresser LLP representing Ghislaine Maxwell, sending a letter to prosecutors regarding Maxwell's case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell

persons.name: Mark S. Cohen
persons.context: Copied on the email from Christian Everdell regarding the letter about Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Laura Menninger
persons.context: Copied on the email from Christian Everdell regarding the letter about Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Scheduled call about Maxwell letter
events.description: Prosecutor Maurene Comey and defense attorney Christian Everdell schedule a 2pm call to discuss a letter from Maxwell's counsel.

events.title: Defense letter submission
events.description: Christian Everdell sends a letter to prosecutors regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's case.

locations: Southern District of New York, 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
Cohen & Gresser LLP, 800 Third Avenue, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document shows ongoing legal proceedings in the Ghislaine Maxwell case in September 2020.
Defense attorney Christian Everdell sent a letter to prosecutors regarding Maxwell's case on September 21, 2020.
Prosecutor Maurene Comey and defense counsel scheduled a call for 2pm on September 22, 2020 to discuss the defense letter.
Maxwell's defense team included Christian Everdell, Mark S. Cohen, Laura Menninger, and Jeff Pagliuca from Cohen & Gresser LLP.
The correspondence demonstrates formal communication between prosecution and defense teams in the Maxwell criminal case.
